mapper.select: select book.bname,book.bcover,reader_book_record.chapter from book,reader_book_record where reader_book_record.rname = #{rname} and book.bname = reader_book_record.bname
select * from book b left join book_tag t on b.bname = t.bname
select * from book_chapter where bname=#{bname} order by chapter
select aname from author_book where bname=#{bname}
select b.bname,b.bcover,ab.aname from author_book ab,reader_book rb,book b where rb.rname=#{rname} and rb.bname=b.bname and ab.bname=b.bname
select bc.chapter,bc.chapterad from book_chapter bc,reader_book_record rbr where rbr.rname=#{rname} and rbr.bname=#{bname} and rbr.bname=bc.bname and rbr.chapter=bc.chapter
select chapterad from book_chapter where bname=#{bname} and chapter=1
select bname from reader_book where rname=#{rname} and bname=#{bname}

select b.bname, b.bcover, b.bchapters, t.tag, ab.aname from author_book ab, book b left join book_tag t on b.bname = t.bname where b.bname like concat('%',#{name},'%') AND b.bname=ab.bname order by length(b.bname) ASC
select b.bname, b.bcover, b.bchapters, t.tag from author_book ab, book b left join book_tag t on b.bname = t.bname where ab.aname=#{aname} AND b.bname=ab.bname order by length(b.bname) ASC
